name: Cufon Smooth Hover
tagline: Enables a smooth hover color transition on Cufonized elements
body:
### Original

Original method. Hover over me

``` Cufon.replace( 'h3' ); ``` ### Original method of applying hover

Original method. Hover over me

``` Cufon.replace( 'h3', { hover: { color: '#999999' } } ); ``` ### Cufon Smooth Hover

Cufon Smooth Hover. Hover over me

``` Cufon.replace( 'h3' ); $.cufonHover(); ```
